problem.markdown:
>>The Green Revolution is characterized by all of the following EXCEPT:<<
() increased fertilizer use () increased water use () increased total food output (x) decreased plant productivity () advances in plant breeding
[explanation] The Green Revolution is characterized by increased fertilization, increased pesticide use, enhanced plant breeding, all of which increased plant productivity. [explanation]
